payload.name: burn-rate-alerting
payload.title: Burn-rate alerting: page on budget consumption, not raw errors
payload.formal: burn rate = current error rate / allowed error rate; page if sustained > threshold.
payload.apm2_mapping: incident holons should trigger on “budget being consumed too fast.” This applies to: CI flakes, tool errors, policy denials, replication failures. It’s the correct control signal.
